SELECT /* ComMapper.sectionSelect */ ROWNUM AS NO_, NO, /*순번*/ SECTION_CD, /*대분류코드*/ SECTION_NM, /*대분류명*/ USE_YN, /*사용여부*/ REG_YMD /*등록일자*/ FROM SECTION where 1=1
AND SECTION_CD LIKE '%'|| #{SECTION_CD} ||'%'
AND SECTION_NM LIKE '%'|| #{SECTION_NM} ||'%'
order by 1, SECTION_NM desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* ComMapper.sectionInsert */ SECTION ( NO, /*순번*/ SECTION_CD, /*대분류코드*/ SECTION_NM, /*대분류명*/ USE_YN, /*사용여부*/ REG_YMD /*등록일자*/ ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(NO), 0)+1 FROM SECTION WHERE SECTION_CD = #{SECTION_CD}) /*순번*/ ,#{SECTION_CD} /*대분류코드*/ ,#{SECTION_NM} /*대분류명*/ ,NVL(#{USE_YN}, 'N') /*사용여부*/ ,SYSDATE /*등록일자*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* ComMapper.sectionUpdate */ SECTION SET SECTION_CD = #{SECTION_CD} /*대분류코드*/ ,SECTION_NM = #{SECTION_NM} /*대분류명*/ ,USE_YN = #{USE_YN} /*사용여부*/ ,REG_YMD = sysdate WHERE NO = #{NO}

INSERT /* ComMapper.comCodeClsfcInster */ INTO CLSFC ( NO /* '순번'; */ ,SECTION_CD /* '대분류_코드'; */ ,CLSFC_CD /* '중분류_코드'; */ ,CLSFC_NM /* '중분류_명'; */ ,ARRAY_NO /* '정렬_순번'; */ ,USE_YN /* '사용여부'; */ ,REG_YMD /* '등록일시'; */
) VALUES( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(NO))+1, 1) AS NO_01 FROM CLSFC WHERE SECTION_CD = #{SECTION_CD} ), #{SECTION_CD}, #{CLSFC_CD}, #{CLSFC_NM}, #{ARRAY_NO}, DECODE(#{USE_YN}, NULL, 'N', #{USE_YN}) , SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* ComMapper.comCodeClsfcUpdate */ CLSFC SET CLSFC_CD = #{CLSFC_CD} /* '중분류_코드'; */ ,CLSFC_NM = #{CLSFC_NM} /* '중분류_명'; */ ,ARRAY_NO = #{ARRAY_NO} /* '정렬_순번'; */ ,USE_YN = #{USE_YN} /*사용여부*/ ,REG_YMD = sysdate WHERE SECTION_CD = #{SECTION_CD} AND NO = #{NO}
